verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> also keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> at his appointed season. <S%H4150><s%>

In the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even, <S%H6153><s%> ye shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it in his appointed season: <S%H4150><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the rites <S%H2708><s%> of it, and according to all <S%H3605><s%> the ceremonies <S%H4941><s%> thereof, shall ye keep <S%H6213><s%> it.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they should keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover. <S%H6453><s%>

And they kept <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even <S%H6153><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai: <S%H5514><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And there were <S%H1961><s%> certain men, <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> that they could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on that <S%H1931><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and they came <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> on that <S%H1931><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%>

And those <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, We <S%H587><s%> are defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man: <S%H120><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> are we kept back, <S%H1639><s%> that we may not <S%H1115><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in his appointed season <S%H4150><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Stand still, <S%H5975><s%> and I will hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> concerning you.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H3588><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> of you or <S%H176><s%> of your posterity <S%H1755><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> by reason of a dead body, <S%H5315><s%> or <S%H176><s%> be in a journey <S%H1870><s%> afar off, <S%H7350><s%> yet he shall keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even <S%H6153><s%> they shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it, and eat <S%H398><s%> it with <S%H5921><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> and bitter <S%H4844><s%> herbs.

They shall leave <S%H7604><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it unto <S%H5704><s%> the morning, <S%H1242><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> break <S%H7665><s%> any bone <S%H6106><s%> of it: according to all <S%H3605><s%> the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%> they shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it.

But the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is clean, <S%H2889><s%> and is <S%H1961><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in a journey, <S%H1870><s%> and forbeareth <S%H2308><s%> to keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover, <S%H6453><s%> even the same <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among his people: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he brought <S%H7126><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the offering <S%H7133><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in his appointed season, <S%H4150><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his sin. <S%H2399><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a stranger <S%H1616><s%> shall sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H854><s%> you, and will keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> according to the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the passover, <S%H6453><s%> and according to the manner <S%H4941><s%> thereof, so <S%H3651><s%> shall he do: <S%H6213><s%> ye shall have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ordinance, <S%H2708><s%> both for the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> and for him that was born <S%H249><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And on the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared up <S%H6965><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> namely, the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony: <S%H5715><s%> and at even <S%H6153><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> as it were the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> it was <S%H1961><s%> always: <S%H8548><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it by day, and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

And when <S%H6310><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> then after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H3651><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed: <S%H5265><s%> and in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode, <S%H7931><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> pitched their tents. <S%H2583><s%>

At <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed, <S%H5265><s%> and at <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they pitched: <S%H2583><s%> as long as <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> they rested in their tents. <S%H2583><s%>

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> tarried long <S%H748><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And so it was, <S%H3426><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a few <S%H4557><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle; <S%H4908><s%> according to <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they abode in their tents, <S%H2583><s%> and according to <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they journeyed. <S%H5265><s%>

And so it was, <S%H3426><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H1961><s%> from even <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6153><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> then they journeyed: <S%H5265><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> it was by day <S%H3119><s%> or by night <S%H3915><s%> that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up, <S%H5927><s%> they journeyed. <S%H5265><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> whether it were two days, <S%H3117><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a month, <S%H2320><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a year, <S%H3117><s%> that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> tarried <S%H748><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> remaining <S%H7931><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> abode in their tents, <S%H2583><s%> and journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> but when it was taken up, <S%H5927><s%> they journeyed. <S%H5265><s%>

At <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they rested in the tents, <S%H2583><s%> and at <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they journeyed: <S%H5265><s%> they kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
